mapper.select: SELECT account_code, account_type AS type, entity_id, currency, category, country, status FROM account_directory WHERE account_type = #{accountType} AND entity_id = #{entityId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_directory( account_code, account_type, entity_id, currency, category, country, status ) VALUES ( #{accountCode}, #{accountType}, #{entityId}, #{currency}, #{category}, #{country}, 'ACTIVE' ) ON CONFLICT (account_code) DO NOTHING
